experiences.title: Research Assistant
Database and Application Manager
experiences.description:
As a Database and Digital Marketing Specialist,  my role encompassed setting up and managing the database system, eZee BurrP, which served as an expensive enterprise system specifically designed for catering operations. Additionally, I took charge of developing the restaurant's website, creating online menus, and launching its social media platforms. :more-details-button 

::more-details
**Key Responsibilities:**

* Install and configure the eZee BurrP database system, tailored to the restaurant's requirements.
* Integrate the restaurant's menu with the digital menu within the eZee BurrP system.
* Launch and develop the restaurant's website and online menu using modern web technologies.
* Establish and manage the restaurant's social media pages for marketing purposes.
* Utilize marketing strategies and advertising techniques to increase social media engagement.

**Achievements:**

* Built a single-page application (SPA) website and online menu using modern web technologies.
* Successfully configured the eZee BurrP database system to optimize restaurant operations.
* Increased engagement and visibility on the restaurant's social media pages through effective marketing strategies.
  ::

experiences.title: IT and Digital Marketing Manager
experiences.description:
As a content manager, I was in charge of uploading new content to the company's website and social media networks. By maintaining an up-to-date and engaging online presence, I successfully attracted and retained a growing number of followers on social media platforms. As I was a professional in web development, I decided to redesign the website. :more-details-button 

::more-details
**Key Responsibilities:**

* Developing the website in Laravel framework to make optimize speed
* Creating daily content on the website, and also for the bugs
* Manage social media platforms, including launching and maintaining pages on various networks.
* Execute marketing campaigns on social media platforms to increase engagement and attract a larger audience.
* Create and maintain a content calendar to ensure consistent and timely delivery of content.

**Achievements:**

* Successfully migrated the company's website from WordPress to the Laravel framework, resulting in improved speed and performance.
::
